body:
lack of inspiration?
the woman on the cover, is the last elf mother from come the race of elve, (like namec of dragon ball) orc have kill all elve, but she run away with and to save her girls ..
they meet dwarfs and men, protecting them and so ...  those beauty give them award for the heroic against vil beast orc...
but one of orc is smart and join the band... so .... 

it's not difficult to imagine some stuff not hard at all, better than that rape shit...
seriously it's frustrating I would like to draw like that and stage all the imagination that comes to me. Alas

beta male and their garbage fantasy

the drawing is godlike, the intention is trash. 

only beta male want do violence against women.
Shout out to all the Xserver homies who see this post.

All those females getting raped make me unconfortable! I enjoyed neromashin story but I get frustated after realizing what I have done!! I know there is somewhere a timeline where those elfs are not getting abused!

"Hey bob, I bet you can't make a doujin that uses 53 tags."

"Fuck you, I bet I can."
This would be great if it wasn't so damn busy. Too many characters and too much going on. I can hardly follow the damn thing.
I would pay good money for that busty virgin elf priestess
john knows no bounds and neither does this guy!
Damn, theres a limit to how elastic you can draw them i mean is this author a fan of Jhon K. Peta or something? haha
